text:
e="preserve">Alexander Borisovich Godunov (Russian:; November 28, 1949 – May 18, 1995) was a Russian-American ballet dancer and movie actor. He was a member of the Bolshoi Ballet. He was known for his roles as Max Beissart in "The Money Pit" (1986) and as Karl Vreski in "Die Hard" (1988).
Godunov died on May 18, 1995 from hepatitis caused by alcoholism at his home in Hollywood, California at the age of 45.
